name: prefix_biquge
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.biquge.com/"),url-prefix("http://www.biquge.la/"),url-prefix("http://www.biquge.tw/"),url-prefix("http://www.biqudao.com/") {
div.reader_mark1,
div.reader_mark0,
div#bdshare,
div.footer,
div.lm, /*热门推荐*/
div.header,
div.ywtop, /*顶部*/
div.con_top, /*改字体那栏*/
div.nav, /*导航栏*/
span[style="color:#E53333;font-size:16px;"],
iframe,
div#cs_right_bottom,
  #cs_left_couplet,
  #cs_right_couplet,
.con_ad,
#BAIDU_DUP_fp_wrapper + a,
[id^="hm_t_"]
{
  display:none!important;
}
}
